
# xdg_user_dir_templates


## Config File Path

* [~/Templates/bash.sh](config/xdg-user-dir-templates/Templates/bash.sh)
* [~/Templates/pygithub.py](config/xdg-user-dir-templates/Templates/pygithub.py)


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
